ITENS.ITEM: Select Count(fr_regras.reg_cod) As TotalRegras From fr_regras

Select Count(fr_formulario_sistema.sis_codigo) as TotalFormulario From fr_formulario Inner Join fr_formulario_sistema On (fr_formulario.frm_codigo = fr_formulario_sistema.frm_codigo) where fr_formulario_sistema.sis_codigo = '[SYS]'
Select Count(fr_relatorio.rel_codigo) as TotalRelatorio From fr_relatorio Where (fr_relatorio.sis_codigo = '[SYS]')
